entries: +10 Str +4, Dex +4, Con +3, Int –4, Wis +2, Cha +0.
top.name: Survival

entries: A damibwa can hold its breath for 5 minutes.
top.name: Deep Breath

entries: A damibwa's hearing is a precise sense at the listed range.
top.name: Echolocation

entries: Small or smaller creature {@condition grabbed} in water; The damibwa attempts an {@skill Athletics} check against the creature's Fortitude DC. Critical Success The damibwa moves up to its swim Speed, dragging the {@condition grabbed} creature along with it. Success The damibwa moves up to half its swim Speed, dragging the {@condition grabbed} creature along with it. Failure The damibwa doesn't move and the creature isn't dragged. Critical Failure The damibwa no longer has the creature {@condition grabbed}.
bot.name: Fetch

bot.requirements: The damibwa is in or adjacent to water
entries: The damibwa moves up to double its swim Speed, descending at least 10 feet, and then makes a jaws {@action Strike}. If it was {@condition undetected} at the start of predatory dive, it remains {@condition undetected} until after the attack.
bot.name: Predatory Dive

attacks.name: alchemist's fire
attacks.damage: {@damage 2d8+2} fire plus 4 {@condition persistent damage ||persistent fire} plus 6 fire splash

entries: +15, {@skill Lore||Weapons Lore} +16 Str +1, Dex +3, Con +1, Int +4, Wis +1, Cha +4 Items smock (as padded armor), fulminating spear (page 76)
top.name: Nature

entries: Ubanu carries these infused items: 8 moderate alchemist's fires, 2 lesser elixirs of life, and 2 moderate tanglefoot bags. These items last for 24 hours, or until the next time Ubanu makes his daily preparations.
top.name: Infused Items

entries: acid splash, detect magic, guidance, prestidigitation, produce flame.
bot.name: Cantrips

entries: Creatures who fail a saving throw against one of Ubanu's spells are {@condition flat-footed} to his attacks until the end of his turn or until the end of his next turn on a critical failure.
bot.name: Distracting Spells

entries: Ubanu Interacts to draw a bomb, then {@action Strike||Strikes} with it.
bot.name: Quick Bomber

entries: +16, {@skill Stealth} +16, {@skill Thievery} +18 (+20 to {@action Pick a Lock}), {@skill Lore||Underworld Lore} +15 Str +3, Dex +4, Con +0, Int +1, Wis +2, Cha +4 Items +1 daggers (4), Habu's Cudgel (page 76), leather armor, infiltrator thieves' tools.
top.name: Intimidation

entries: Advantage Froglegs isn't {@condition flat-footed} to creatures of 8th level or lower that are {@condition hidden}, {@condition undetected}, flanking, or using surprise attack.
mid.name: Deny

entries: Fighter Froglegs deals an additional {@damage 2d6} precision damage with weapons from the {@group knife}, and knives gain the {@trait deadly <d10>} weapon property while she wields them.
bot.name: Knife

entries: Through an enemy's space; Froglegs attempts.
bot.name: Roll and Snatch

entries: {@action Trip} the enemy. She can use her tongue for this attempt and does not need to have a free hand.
bot.name: to Disarm or

entries: Froglegs makes two dagger {@action Strike||Strikes}.
bot.name: Twin Slash

entries: A gbahali can hold its breath for 2 hours.
Str +7, Dex +4, Con +5, Int –3, Wis +4, Cha –2.
top.name: Deep Breath

entries: 40 feet.
bot.name: Aquatic Ambush

entries: A gbahali jumps 10 feet up on a successful {@action High Jump} or 20 feet up on a critical success.
bot.name: Powerful Jumper

entries: Medium, {@damage 2d8+7} bludgeoning, Rupture 20.
bot.name: Swallow Whole

entries: +17, {@skill Survival} +14 Str +5, Dex +1, Con +4, Int +1, Wis +2, Cha +4.
top.name: Performance

entries: When the great grodair dies, his body explodes in a blast of pressurized water that deals {@damage 6d6} bludgeoning damage to creatures within a 15-foot emanation (DC 25 basic Reflex save). A creature that fails its save is pushed 5 feet (or 10 feet on a critical failure).
mid.name: Death Flood

entries: The great grodair transforms all soil, sand, or similar sediment in a 10-foot emanation into mud for 1 round. This mud is {@quickref difficult terrain||3|terrain} for creatures other than grodairs.
bot.name: Muddy Field

entries: The great grodair causes water to pour from a magical sac on his spine, either a stream of water at a rate of 1 gallon per round, or a fountain in a 5-foot-long stream at a rate of 5 gallons per round. He can stop the flow of water as a single action.
bot.name: Organ of Endless Water

entries: +14 Str +2, Dex +4, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha +0 Items dart (8), staff.
top.name: Stealth

mid.trigger: A {@condition hostile} creature targets the jinxer with a melee {@action Strike}
entries: Tattoos on the jinxer's body swirl and shift in mesmerizing patterns. The creature must attempt a DC 22 Will save. Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 hour. Success The creature is unaffected and is temporarily immune for 1 minute. Failure The creature treats the jinxer as {@condition concealed} until the end of its turn. Critical Failure The creature treats the jinxer as {@condition hidden} until the end of its turn.
mid.name: Hypnotic Tattoos

entries: Saving Throw Fortitude DC 24
bot.name: Baneback Poison

entries: 6 rounds; Stage 1 {@damage 2d4} poison damage and {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 1} (1 round); Stage 2 {@damage 3d4} poison damage and {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 2} (1 round); Stage 3 {@damage 4d4} poison damage, {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 3}, and {@condition flat-footed} (1 round)
bot.name: Maximum Duration

entries: The jinxer magically intensifies toxins in their foes. Creatures within 30 feet of the jinxer that are currently afflicted by a poison immediately attempt their next saving throw against the poison with a –2 status penalty, then are temporarily immune to Curse of Baleful Venom for 1 hour.
bot.name: Curse of Baneful Venom

entries: Gripplis ignore {@quickref difficult terrain||3|terrain} in forests and jungles.
bot.name: Jungle Stride

entries: When the skirmisher uses the {@action Step} action they ignore {@quickref difficult terrain||3|terrain} and may move up to 10 feet instead of 5 feet.
top.name: Springing Step

mid.trigger: A creature misses the skirmisher with a melee {@action Strike}
entries: The skirmisher quickly takes advantage of the attacker's error and {@action Step||Steps}.
mid.name: Hopping Dodge

entries: Gripplis ignore {@quickref difficult terrain||3|terrain} in forests and jungles.
bot.name: Jungle Stride

entries: The skirmisher deals an extra {@damage 1d6} precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures and creatures afflicted by a poison.
bot.name: Wily Attack

entries: The i'iko dragon breathes a spray of jagged glass shards that deals {@damage 7d6} piercing damage in a 15-foot cone (DC 23 basic Reflex save). They can't use Breath Weapon again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Breath Weapon

entries: The i'iko dragon attempts to capsize an aquatic vessel of Medium size or smaller that they're on or adjacent to. They must succeed at an {@skill Athletics} check with a DC of 25 or the pilot's {@skill Lore||Sailing Lore} DC, whichever is higher.
bot.name: Cunning Capsize

entries: The i'iko dragon spreads their wings, bares their teeth, and threatens their opponent in a terrifying display of draconic majesty. All creatures within 30 feet must attempt a DC 24 Will save. Regardless of the result of the saving throw, the creatures are temporarily immune.
bot.name: Draconic Grandeur

entries: Grandeur for 1 minute.
bot.name: to Draconic

entries: The i'iko dragon Flies up to their fly Speed, descending at least 10 feet, and then makes a jaws {@action Strike}. If the jaws {@action Strike} hits and the target is Medium or smaller, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.
bot.name: Tackle

entries: +11, {@skill Lore||Underworld Lore} +8 Str +1, Dex +4, Con +0, Int +1, Wis +2, Cha +2 Items dagger (6), studded leather armor, thieves' tools.
top.name: Thievery

entries: Creatures hit by Kiru's dagger {@action Strike} must succeed at a DC 20 Fortitude save or become {@condition clumsy|CRB|clumsy 1} for 1 round (1 minute on a critical failure). If Kiru's {@action Strike} is a critical hit, the DC increases to 25.
bot.name: Knife Jab

entries: Attack Kiru deals an extra {@damage 1d6} precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak

entries: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are {@condition flat-footed} to Kiru.
bot.name: Surprise Attack

entries: +12, {@skill Thievery} +14 Str +4, Dex +2, Con +4, Int +2, Wis +1, Cha +3 Items heavy crossbow (10 bolts), lesser elixir of life, leather armor, longsword, strongbox key, thieves' tools.
top.name: Society

entries: If Kolbo is aware of his opponents and isn't prevented from speaking, he rolls {@skill Deception} for initiative.
top.name: A Quick Word

entries: Advantage Kolbo isn't {@condition flat-footed} to creatures of 6th level or lower that are {@condition hidden}, {@condition undetected}, flanking, or using surprise attack.
mid.name: Deny

entries: The foe is knocked {@condition prone}.
bot.name: Low Blow

entries: Attack Kolbo deals an extra {@damage 2d6} precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak

entries: When Kreekoss rolls a success on a Reflex save, he gets a critical success instead.
mid.name: Evasion

entries: Kreekoss Flies up to double his fly Speed in a straight line, descending at least 10 feet, and then makes a talon {@action Strike}.
Snatch Kreekoss can {@action Fly} at half Speed while he has a creature {@condition grabbed} or {@condition restrained} in his talons, carrying that creature along with it.
bot.name: Eagle Dive

entries: +12 Str +4, Dex +4, Con +1, Int +0, Wis +3, Cha +0 Items +1 greatclub, recipe books.
top.name: Thievery

entries: Loakan makes a greatclub {@action Strike} and two tail {@action Strike||Strikes} against the same creature. If the greatclub {@action Strike} hits, the target is {@condition flat-footed} against both tail {@action Strike||Strikes}.
bot.name: Battering Tail

entries: Breath Loakan can hold her breath for 200 rounds (20 minutes).
bot.name: Deep

entries: +11, {@skill Thievery} +13 Str +4, Dex +4, Con +2, Int +0, Wis +4, Cha +0 Items hand crossbow (10 bolts), leather armor, longsword, thieves' tools.
top.name: Stealth

entries: Disarms a creature; Mashkudu attempts a {@skill Thievery} check to {@action Steal} an object the target carries.
bot.name: Trips, or

entries: Mashkudu deals an extra {@damage 1d6} precision damage to {@condition flat-footed} creatures.
bot.name: Sneak Attack

entries: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are {@condition flat-footed} to Mashkudu.
bot.name: Surprise Attack

entries: 5 feet. A buzzing static electricity surrounds the mpeshi. When a creature within the aura takes electricity damage, the damage arcs to a random adjacent creature, dealing {@damage 1d6} electricity damage. A creature can only receive arcing damage once from each attack or effect.
mid.name: Lightning Aura

mid.trigger: The mpeshi falls at least 10 feet
entries: The mpeshi reorients itself to slam headfirst into the ground with a thundering crash. Creatures within 10 feet of the mpeshi take sonic damage equal to the bludgeoning damage the mpeshi took from the fall (DC 23 basic Fortitude save). Creatures that fail this save are {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 1} ({@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 2} on a critical failure).
mid.name: Thunderous Fall

entries: The mpeshi leaps up to 40 feet in any direction, including straight up. The mpeshi makes a horn {@action Strike} at any point during this leap.
bot.name: Charging Leap

entries: The mpeshi can tread on clouds or fog as though on solid ground.
bot.name: Cloud Walk

attacks.name: pseudopod
attacks.damage: {@damage 2d8+5} bludgeoning plus {@damage 1d4} acid and {@damage 1d4} {@condition persistent damage ||persistent acid}

entries: A sewer ooze can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movements.
top.name: Motion Sense

entries: 30 feet. A creature that enters the area must attempt a DC 23 Fortitude save.

On a failure, the creature is {@condition sickened|CRB|sickened 1} ({@condition sickened|CRB|sickened 2} on a critical failure). A creature taking {@condition persistent damage ||persistent acid damage} from the ooze's pseudopod can't recover from the {@condition sickened} condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.
mid.name: Noxious Scent

entries: The sewer ooze unleashes a wave of filth, covering all creatures within a 20-foot emanation. Each creature in the area must succeed at a DC 24 Reflex save or take {@damage 1d4} acid damage and a –10-foot penalty to its Speeds for 1 minute (on a critical failure, the creature also falls {@condition prone}). A creature can spend an {@action Interact} action to clean someone off, decreasing.
bot.name: Filth Wave

entries: Speed penalty by 5 feet with each action.
bot.name: the

bot.requirements: Old Thrasher must have a creature {@condition grabbed}
entries: Old Thrasher tucks its legs and rolls rapidly, twisting its victim. It makes a jaws {@action Strike} with a +2 circumstance bonus to the attack roll against the {@condition grabbed} creature. If it hits, it also knocks the creature {@condition prone}. If it fails, it releases the creature.
bot.name: Death Roll

entries: Thrasher can hold its breath for about 4 hours.
bot.name: Deep Breath Old

bot.requirements: Old Thrasher must have a creature {@condition grabbed}
entries: Old Thrasher Swims, bringing its victim along with it.
bot.name: Into the Deep

entries: Old Thrasher makes up to three tail {@action Strike||Strikes} against different targets. Any target hit must succeed at a DC 25 Fortitude save (DC 30 on a critical hit) or be knocked {@condition prone}.
bot.name: Thunderous Tail

entries: +15, {@skill Survival} +13, {@skill Thievery} +15 Str +3, Dex +4, Con +1, Int +1, Wis +2, Cha +2 Items +1 hand crossbow (10 bolts), keyring, leather armor, thieves' tools.
top.name: Stealth

entries: Reth gains a deadly focus with crossbows while in this stance. His crossbow {@action Strike||Strikes} deal an additional {@damage 3d8} precision damage. He doesn't provoke reactions for making ranged {@action Strike||Strikes} with crossbows.
bot.name: Deadly Bolts

entries: Breath Reth can hold his breath for 200 rounds (20 minutes).
bot.name: Deep

entries: Reth {@action Stride||Strides}, {@action Step||Steps}, or {@action Sneak||Sneaks}, then Interacts to reload.
bot.name: Running Reload

entries: Reth {@action Stride||Strides} or {@action Step||Steps}, then {@action Strike||Strikes} with his hand crossbow.
bot.name: Skirmishing Shot

entries: +19, {@skill Occultism} +18, {@skill Society} +18, {@skill Stealth} +18 Str +4, Dex +3, Con +2, Int +5, Wis +4, Cha +6 Items bracers of armor type I, choker of elocution (imparts Xanmba, a regional language spoken by many in Nantambu)
top.name: Intimidation

entries: Salathiss transforms one of his hands into a tentacle with a blade at the end, allowing him to make morphic weapon {@action Strike||Strikes}. If he's disguised, whether by magical or mundane means, his disguise immediately ends. He can return his hand to normal with another use of this ability, but doing so doesn't restore his disguise.
bot.name: Morphic Weapon

entries: If Salathiss interacts with a creature for 10 minutes, he can choose to expertly duplicate that person. He can roll any {@skill Deception} check to {@action Impersonate} that person twice and take the higher result. This benefit lasts for 24 hours or until he uses this ability on a different creature.
bot.name: Peerless Duplicate

entries: Saving Throw DC 26 Fortitude
bot.name: Serpentfolk Venom

entries: 6 rounds; Stage 1 {@damage 2d4} poison damage and {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 1} (1 round); Stage 2 {@damage 3d4} poison damage and {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 2} (1 round)
bot.name: Maximum Duration

mid.trigger: The granitescale takes piercing or slashing damage
entries: The granitescale twists to take the blow on their hardest scales, which they shed to reduce the incoming force. The granitescale reduces the damage by 10, but their AC is reduced by 2 for 1 day, when the shed scales regrow.
mid.name: Chipping Scales

bot.requirements: The granitescale's last action was a successful spear {@action Strike}
entries: The granitescale rattles the base of their spear, attempting an {@skill Intimidation} check to {@action Demoralize} all enemies within 30 feet (compare the granitescale's {@skill Intimidation} check result to the targets' Will DCs individually).
bot.name: Rattling Spear

entries: Saving Throw DC 22 Fortitude
bot.name: Serpentfolk Venom

entries: 6 rounds; Stage 1 {@damage 1d4} poison damage and {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 1} (1 round); Stage 2 {@damage 2d4} poison damage and {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 1} (1 round)
bot.name: Maximum Duration

entries: +15 Str +0, Dex +4, Con +2, Int +6, Wis +4, Cha +2 Items shortbow (20 arrows), sickle.
top.name: Survival

entries: As granitescale, but DC 23.
bot.name: Serpentfolk Venom
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Serpentfolk Venom As granitescale, but DC 23.' in Serpentfolk Venom Caller, p.87

entries: The venom caller conjures a 10-foot burst of liquid poison within 60 feet. Each creature that begins its turn in the area takes {@damage 4d6} poison damage (DC 25 basic Fortitude save). On a critical failure, creatures also take {@damage 1d6} {@condition persistent damage ||persistent poison damage}. Once per turn, starting the turn after the venom caller uses Venom Pool, the venom caller can use a single action, which has the {@trait concentrate} trait, to increase the radius of the burst by 5 feet. The pool of venom lasts for 1 minute, at which time it evaporates without a trace.
bot.name: Venom Pool
